text: Egha Andru Saimon inigha Iesus bagha ghu. Ezɨ Iesus an gara egha mɨgei, “Nɨ Saimon, Jonɨn Otarim. Eghtɨ me gɨn ziam ‘Sifas’ nɨ darɨgh nɨ dɨponam.” (Ziar kam “Sifas,” a ziar kam “Pitan” mɨrara ghu. An mɨngarim kamakɨn, “Dagɨam.”)(1:42) Ziar kam Sifas, an Aramɨn akam ize. Dughiar kamɨn a Judabar akam. Ezɨ ziar kam Pita, a Grighɨn akamɨn ize.
